content.raw:
I will resolve the merge conflict, remove the dtype workaround (no longer required as per pull request #54) and merge this on Monday if there are no comments.

The socket changes are untested, but regressions on Python 2 are unlikely given it's just `b''` prefixes and `.decode('utf8')`, and we need to move things along with merging these Python 3 changes.
content.html:
I will resolve the merge conflict, remove the dtype workaround (no longer required as per pull request #54) and merge this on Monday if there are no comments.

The socket changes are untested, but regressions on Python 2 are unlikely given it's just b'' prefixes and .decode('utf8'), and we need to move things along with merging these Python 3 changes.
